title: Solo Que Guide Product
body:
Hello Summoners, 

For my college marketing class I need to conduct research on the market for a theoretical product, any input is greatly appreciated,  *and remember to vote!*

Would you consider purchasing a guide for $29.99 that provided you a very detailed five step plan to raising your solo que elo to challenger, including videos on improving individual skills, training materials for tracking progress, and exclusive content related from best League of Legends players on the world?

Commenting below with feedback as to **why** or **why not** would be great! 

Thanks for your time!
Twin Disciplines

replies.body:
I would say no, for  a few reasons.
Google
6 dollars per tip is a rather steep price.
League requires lots of practice, and that's something no guide can give you.
